function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty conducting group sessions due to private or sensitive subject matter","Impact":"Limitation in gathering diverse perspectives and critical awareness","Mitigation":"Provide alternative methods for individuals to contribute their perspectives privately","Technologies":"Online discussion platforms with private messaging features","People":"Researchers, participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Issues of lockdown preventing in-person sessions","Impact":"Limitation in obtaining in-depth information about household experiences in confinement","Mitigation":"Utilize remote qualitative participatory techniques for data collection","Technologies":"Video conferencing tools, remote interview platforms","People":"Researchers, households in confinement","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of the most vulnerable individuals to explain their reality","Impact":"Risk of misrepresentation or misunderstanding of the experiences of vulnerable individuals","Mitigation":"Provide additional support and guidance for vulnerable individuals to accurately express their reality","Technologies":"User-friendly multimedia platforms for storytelling, access to resources for cultural expression","People":"Vulnerable individuals, researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
